body_html:
im2col implementation is here
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/im2col.h
and it is used e.g. in Spatial Convolutions here
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.cu#L164-L169
What are you trying to do? Won't Convolution modules that are already present fit your needs?

body:
im2col implementation is here 
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/im2col.h
and it is used e.g. in Spatial Convolutions here
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.cu#L164-L169
What are you trying to do? Won't Convolution modules that are already present fit your needs?
